p: Among the 60 SHARED‚Äê2 participants, 5 participants (8%; 95% CI: 1, 15) had abnormal laboratory results that met the criteria for release to the study clinician. For three of the unblinding events, the grade 3 hypernatremia results were reported on the same day and none of the participants exhibited signs or symptoms of dehydration. Without intervention, the sodium levels in these 3 participants were within normal levels on redraw.
